title: DE Embedding Creation
description: DE Embedding creation transforms text chunks into numerical vector representations that capture semantic meaning.
whatItDoes: DE Embedding models convert text into high-dimensional vectors where similar texts are positioned closer together in the vector space. These embeddings enable semantic search and similarity matching.
whyItMatters: DE The quality of your embeddings directly affects retrieval accuracy. Better embeddings capture more nuanced semantic relationships and lead to more relevant search results.
challenges: DE Selecting appropriate embedding models for your domain
DE Managing embedding dimensionality and computational costs
DE Dealing with embedding model limitations and biases
DE Keeping embeddings up-to-date with model advancements
